title: How to Clean Under Laptop Keyboard Keys

steps.headline: Pop off the sticky keys with a screwdriver.
Apply an all-surface cleaner to the rag and wipe the keyboard with it.
Put all of the keys back on after it dries.
Buy special cleaning putty.
steps.description: This is usually available cheaply online and in-store.

steps.headline: The putty will form its shape over the keys and seep through the cracks.
Pull the putty carefully off the keyboard, so as to not break off the keys.
steps.description: Wash off any dirt and crumbs.

steps.headline: Repeat all over the keyboard for a thorough clean.

text: Wiping Pop off the sticky keys with a screwdriver.  Apply an all-surface cleaner to the rag and wipe the keyboard with it.  Put all of the keys back on after it dries.  Putty Buy special cleaning putty. This is usually available cheaply online and in-store. Place putty on the keyboard.  The putty will form its shape over the keys and seep through the cracks.  Pull the putty carefully off the keyboard, so as to not break off the keys. Wash off any dirt and crumbs. Repeat all over the keyboard for a thorough clean.
sentences: Wiping Pop off the sticky keys with a screwdriver.
Apply an all-surface cleaner to the rag and wipe the keyboard with it.
Put all of the keys back on after it dries.
This is usually available cheaply online and in-store.
The putty will form its shape over the keys and seep through the cracks.
Pull the putty carefully off the keyboard, so as to not break off the keys.
Wash off any dirt and crumbs.
Repeat all over the keyboard for a thorough clean.
